parameters.name: FuncType
parameters.description: The type of the masking algorithm.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. The maximum value is 100.

parameters.name: RuleId
parameters.description: The ID of the masking rule.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the masking rule.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

>  To view the ID of the tenant, move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner of the Data Management (DMS) console. For more information, see [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~).
